name: WallyClock
tagline: Simple wall clock with sensors showing Time, Humidity and temperature.
body:
Wally Clock =========== Welcome ------- A simple embedded based project, a digital clock with some sensors which gives you information about the surroundings. ## Links to follow + Plan + Components + Schematic + Power Supply + Fabrication + Installation + Up and running + Result, conslusion and scope of enhancement + Further application of the same
Email me at Annim Banerjee Annim Banerjee Follow me here - Facebook - Linked In - Youth4Work
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
